title: high ping
body: I got comcast. live in Oregon and constantly have 110 ping. Is there anyway I can lower it to make the game playable? IDK if it's distance issue from here to Chicago or anything else. please help.

replies.body: That high ping might be because of two things off the top of my head: your ISP routing your connection in a really weird way, or possibly just some awkward network settings. Let's check those settings first really quickly using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure to hit the steps on port forwarding and configuring your DNS as those have a lot of success usually.
